    Omit<React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<"input">, "size" | "disabled" | "defaultValue"> &\r
    InputStyling &\r
    BasicFieldOptions & {\r
    /**\r
     * Allow decimals\r
     *\r
     * Default = true\r
     */\r
    allowDecimals?: boolean\r
    /**\r
     * Allow user to enter negative value\r
     *\r
     * Default = true\r
     */\r
    allowNegativeValue?: boolean\r
    /**\r
     * Component id\r
     */\r
    id?: string\r
    /**\r
     *  Maximum characters the user can enter\r
     */\r
    maxLength?: number\r
    /**\r
     * Limit length of decimals allowed\r
     *\r
     * Default = 2\r
     */\r
    decimalsLimit?: number\r
    /**\r
     * Specify decimal scale for padding/trimming\r
     *\r
     * Example:\r
     *   1.5 -> 1.50\r
     *   1.234 -> 1.23\r
     */\r
    decimalScale?: number\r
    /**\r
     * Default value if uncontrolled\r
     */\r
    defaultValue?: number | string\r
    /**\r
     * Value will always have the specified length of decimals\r
     *\r
     * Example:\r
     *   123 -> 1.23\r
     *\r
     * Note: This formatting only happens onBlur\r
     */\r
    fixedDecimalLength?: number\r
    /**\r
     * Placeholder if there is no value\r
     */\r
    placeholder?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Include a prefix eg. \xA3\r
     */\r
    prefix?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Include a suffix eg. \u20AC\r
     */\r
    suffix?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Incremental value change on arrow down and arrow up key press\r
     */\r
    step?: number\r
    /**\r
     * Separator between integer part and fractional part of value.\r
     *\r
     * This cannot be a number\r
     */\r
    decimalSeparator?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Separator between thousand, million and billion\r
     *\r
     * This cannot be a number\r
     */\r
    groupSeparator?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Disable auto adding separator between values eg. 1000 -> 1,000\r
     *\r
     * Default = false\r
     */\r
    disableGroupSeparators?: boolean\r
    /**\r
     * Disable abbreviations (m, k, b)\r
     *\r
     * Default = false\r
     */\r
    disableAbbreviations?: boolean\r
    /**\r
     * International locale config, examples:\r
     *   { locale: 'ja-JP', currency: 'JPY' }\r
     *   { locale: 'en-IN', currency: 'INR' }\r
     *\r
     * Any prefix, groupSeparator or decimalSeparator options passed in\r
     * will override Intl Locale config\r
     */\r
    intlConfig?: IntlConfig\r
    /**\r
     * Transform the raw value form the input before parsing\r
     */\r
    transformRawValue?: (rawValue: string) => string\r
    /**\r
     * Callback invoked when value changes\r
     */\r
    onValueChange?: (value: (string | undefined), name?: string, values?: CurrencyInputOnChangeValues) => void\r
